alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 12:54AM CST until January 04 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 1253 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Beaumont to near McLain to 13 miles west of Lucedale to 9 miles east of Wiggins, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leakesville, Deer Park, McLain, State Line and Fruitdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southwestern Alabama.
